channel.title: Hobbies on Quakkels.com

item.title: Hand Tool Woodworking
item.description: I recently took up hand tool woodworking. I’m not good at it. But I’m having fun. These are my favorite resources for learning about it. The English Woodworker Rex Krueger Wood By Wright A Bench As is the case with many beginners; my first woodworking project was my bench. I decided to build a Low Roman Workbench after seeing what Rex Krueger and Christopher Schwarz had to say about them.
